name: Death Dice
description:
Death Dice 

It's a 2D dice game for mobil, in a bloody and horror universe, a board game genre.

Finishing the game depends on your luck to avoid every obstacle!

The game include two players mode that can be unlocked if you arrive at the 100th case in one player mode.

Hope you are a lucky gamer.

Enjoy!!

If you like the game, download the full version : https://jimmyrandriamananagame.itch.io/death-dice-full
